subject: Football
Coaches and Managers
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Clark, a longtime N.F.L. coach, led the Detroit Lions to the playoffs in 1982 and 1983 and was an assistant on the Miami Dolphins’ undefeated team in 1972.
snippet: Mr. Clark, a longtime N.F.L. coach, led the Detroit Lions to the playoffs in 1982 and 1983 and was an assistant on the Miami Dolphins’ undefeated team in 1972.
